channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Newsletter, SMTP, Email marketing and Subscribe forms by Sendinblue
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Newsletter, SMTP, Email marketing and Subscribe forms by Sendinblue

item.title: CVE-2021-24874|2024-08-03T19:49:14.383Z -- unknown -- newsletter%2C%20smtp%2C%20email%20marketing%20and%20subscribe%20forms%20by%20sendinblue
item.description: The Newsletter, SMTP, Email marketing and Subscribe forms by Sendinblue WordPress plugin before 3.1.31 does not escape the lang and pid parameter before outputting them back in attributes, leading to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issues

item.title: CVE-2021-24923|2024-08-03T19:49:13.481Z -- unknown -- newsletter%2C%20smtp%2C%20email%20marketing%20and%20subscribe%20forms%20by%20sendinblue
item.description: The Newsletter, SMTP, Email marketing and Subscribe forms by Sendinblue WordPress plugin before 3.1.25 does not escape the sib-statistics-date parameter before outputting it back in an attribute, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue
